title: Come and join us at Luna Park for free!

replies.body: What about little old tassie? :(
^^^ yeah what about Tassie? we never get anything :c
^^^ Bet your sister does #GoT #insest

**You** get **lots** of **incest**

0/10 Hang your head in shame.
Tasmania isn't part of OCE but NZ is LOL
Tasmania isn't a country cock head is state of Australia
Was just about to ask about tassie, ninja'd
Well tell me pls  if i set off from Central (i mean in Sydney), how will i arrive there
You can see all the travel details [here](http://www.lunapark.sydney/). See you there!
To go to Luna Park, get off at Milson's Point
Will there be any females there? They make me nervous...
rito pls why on my mums bday ahahha
Bring her down to the Luna Park!
Hmm might have to get down to brisvags {{champion:18}}
Cool, hope you get some tickets!
Completely misses the capital of Australia, Canberra :'(
You raise a really good point, let me think about how we can work on this.
Hoyts Woden or Belco would be a great place to show it!
its only in the major city Hoyts, any online viewing for those that don't live in the major cities or can not get to Sydney to go Luna Park.
Correct we have tried to cover as many of the main locations as possible. Hope you can get down to one!
Are we able to get the show bags with all those goodies ?
If you attend the OPL Final in the Big Top or a HOYTS screening there will be a show bag at each. The show bags are not identical but they are still great.
Great Idea for us lonely Perth dudes and dudettes! Thanks RITO!
Hey BaconPoroDeluxe, can you make it to the HOYTS viewing in Perth?
Sure Can! Can't wait. (also, this is a really late reply... woooooooops)
where can you buy tickets to watch them at hoyts and when and how??? :3
Hey, just go [here](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oplfinals-2015/) and click viewing parties and you will be all set, hope this helps and have a great time!
Really cut not in Canberra cinemas
Sorry no Canberra presently.
Keep replying to the Canberra ones, and ignoring the tasmanian ones, nice...
Hi Ringer that was not intentional so sorry if it felt I was ignoring Tasmania.
Can u give us specific hoyts places that will be showing the stream or will all hoyts be showing. My closest one is in chatswood but its kind of small so would it be showing there or nope??

Hi, the list are as follows:

Sydney Broadway
Adelaide Norwood
Perth Carousel 
Melbourne Highpoint
Auckland Sylvia
Brisbane Stafford

You can book here and see the cinemas [here](http://www.hoyts.com.au/movies/2015/league_of_legends_2015_opl_grand_final.aspx) also. Hope this helps.
Broadway is literally 5 mins away from where I live YAY
or u could go to the event which is in the same place..
Awesome get a ticket and get down there! GGWP!

Hi there, I run a large Lan party on the Gold Coast in Queensland and we have a LAN Scheduled for August 8th. I'm wondering if it would be possible to figure out a way for us to watch alongside? Usually we will just have something from twitch playing during the lan on stage.
Do you still get the show bag if you go to Luna park?
Hi, the show bag at Luna Park is for the finals ticket holders only who have a seat in the big top. We also have a show bag for the HOYTS showings as well. Hope this helps.
If we watch the OPL Grand Finals at HOYTS, do we have to come for the whole 6 hours?

If you are coming down for the whole day, we will have buses leaving from Luna at 4pm to HOYTS Broadway, and we will advise you all soon on how you make sure you get a place on the bus. So yes you will have time to take in all the activities :)

Have they fixed the issues with playing in a cinema? I went to worlds at Sydney and walked out 3 hours in. They played from a youtube video, which had constant issues they made us sit through the 30 min countdown when they could have skipped it. We eventually got through the pre-game events and then halfway through the first game it stopped so they attempted to get it to continue buffering and the person using it obviously doesn't know league and we ended up starting up again in the second game! (and this all took 3 hours and for someone who had to drive back to Canberra I'd had enough) It was horrible and they only good thing was that they refunded mine and the rest of my groups money bar the $1.50 booking fee so I got popcorn for $1.50. I honestly feel like it was the biggest waste of time and effort.

Hey, so yes. I wont go into the specifications but we will be sending a direct feed to all the HOYTS locations so it will not be a browser based over the net experience. So the quality should be very high. Sorry you had a poor experience last time.
that ashe is so tanky{{champion:79}}
anyone selling any tickets to the final? :D
